course.subject: CENG
course.name: Chemical Engineering Project
course.description: A one year long final year project involves the application of Chemical Engineering principles to the design, planning, experimental or analytical investigation of current engineering design and research problems. Working in small teams and individually under supervision, students are expected to demonstrate creative and critical powers through choices and decisions made in areas of uncertainty. Students should have normally completed the second year program. Credit load will be spread over the year.
course.prerequisites: CENG 3120 AND CENG 3910 AND LANG 2030

reviews.author: ROMI
reviews.comment_content: You work in your team and create an idea. You develop your idea on your own and then also do a little presentation on it.
reviews.comment_teaching: Depending on your professor. Mine was good
reviews.comment_grading: Very good. It's easy to get a good grade. However if one of your team mates doesn't partcipate its important to report it because they may grade the teams performance as well.
reviews.comment_workload: A lot considering that this is only a small project. However. If you put in the work it will also be worth it.
